mean_cn: n. （特指当权者进行的）严责，谴责，申斥；  v. 申斥，谴责，惩戒
mean_en: to speak in an angry and critical way to (someone who has done something wrong, disobeyed an order, etc.)
short_phrase: reprimand the girl for her mistakes
sentence: The boy was reprimanded by his teacher for dyeing his hair.
sentence_trans: 他因染发被老师训斥了。
